original_text: Of Gershon was the family of the Libnites, and the family of the Shimites: these are the families of the Gershonites.
korean_text: 게르손에게서는 립니 종족과 시므이 종족이 났으니 이들이 곧 게르손의 조상의 가문들이라

sentences.original_text: Of Gershon was the family of the Libnites
and the family of the Shimites
these are the families of the Gershonites
